# ConsoleBufferCell.FromChar method

Creates a new ConsoleBufferCell with the provided character, but Foreground and Background are AnsiColor.Default.

```csharp
public static ConsoleBufferCell FromChar(char c)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| c | Character to set in the new cell |

## Return Value

New ConsoleBufferCell.
